steps.title: Step 1: Development environment creation
steps.body:
We will simply create a Scratch Org, which is an ephemeral development environment.
This will allow us to realize our configuration but also see how Salesforce DX enables collaborative development, continuous integration and continuous deployment.

steps.title: Step 2: Data model creation
steps.body:
Follow the instructions to create the data model yourself in your org.
To do this, use Object Manager.

Then you can finalize the data model by pushing the metadata defined here.

steps.title: Step 3: App creation
steps.body:
You were able to test the use of the object "Travel Approval"! Hurray!
And what about creating a dedicated application to manage travel approval requests...
To do that, let's use the App Manager.
